channel.title: CVE Feed for pankajagarwal -- Contact Form by FormGet – Best Form Builder Plugin for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pankajagarwal -- Contact Form by FormGet – Best Form Builder Plugin for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-5125|2024-08-02T07:44:53.709Z -- pankajagarwal -- contact%20form%20by%20formget%20%E2%80%93%20best%20form%20builder%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Contact Form by FormGet plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'formget' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 5.5.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
